title: Pentair 521105 IntelliChlor IC60 Salt Chlorine Generator Cell (US Version)
features: Fits Pentair ComPool to EasyTouch upgrade system
Measures 1-1/2-inch length by 4/7-inch height by 4/7-inch width

description: IntelliChlor IC60 Cell for pools up to 60,000 gallons. New installations require PC100 power center to operate.Pentair IntelliChlor Electronic Chlorine Generator takes electrolytic chlorine generation to a higher level of convenience, reliability and safety. Electrolytic Chlorine Generation is the easiest, most effective and convenient way to keep pool water sparkling clean. The Pentair IntelliChlor chlorine generator uses common table salt to produce all the chlorine your pool needs, right in your pool - safely, effectively, and automatically. Same sanitation performance as manual chlorine addition without the drawbacks. No need to buy, transport and store expensive chlorine compounds. No more odor, stinging eyes, irritated skin and bleached out swimsuits
